/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The buildings, tall and imposing, are constructed of concrete and glass, reflecting the city's modern architectural style. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting two parts of the city. The image is a blend of urban development and natural beauty, showcasing the vibrant life in Beijing.
